Nasdaq - Individual Market Analysis

CoT signals and diagnostics for Nasdaq futures.

As of 2025-10-21

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • NASDAQ-100 speculative net positioning is 16.40% of OI, with hedgers at -18.70% as of 2025-10-21.
  • The market exhibits extreme speculative long positioning and deep hedger short positioning.
  • Recent 4-week flow shows a continued long build of 7.90% by speculators.

Technical Summary:

  • Speculative z-score is 1.8384, indicating stretched long positioning near a 1-year extreme.
  • Hedger z-score is -1.5235, also showing stretched short positioning.
  • Although no explicit reversal signals are active, hedgers remain in a 'Deep Short' regime.
  • Current conditions do not flag squeeze or exhaustion risk.

References:

  • NASDAQ_100_Consolidated_CoT_Signals, latest data 2025-10-21. (Influenced by Spec_Net_%OI, Hedger_Net_%OI, z-scores, Flow_4w)
  • Price data for NASDAQ-100, latest 2025-10-21.
  • Public CoT reports from CFTC/CME Group.
  • Historical volatility data (e.g., VIX) would enhance future analysis.
